Question: HLC Metal Parts Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HLC Metal Parts Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Provides one-stop custom solutions for metal parts
- Specializes in metal stamping, CNC machining, and silver contacts
- Offers high-precision manufacturing with tolerances down to ±0.001 in. (0.020mm)
- Capable of producing parts with a size range of 0.2 inches to 8 inches in diameter and up to 20 inches in length
- Utilizes advanced CAM software to optimize tool paths and reduce costing
- Offers finishing options for CNC machined parts
- Accommodates various materials including copper, aluminum, steel, brass, and plastics
- Serves industries such as aerospace, automotive, defense, electronics, and medical devices
Summary_cn:
HLC金属零件有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 提供一站式定制金属零件解决方案
- 专注于金属冲压、数控加工和银触点
- 提供高精度制造，公差可达±0.001英寸（0.020mm）
- 能够生产直径0.2英寸到8英寸、长度最长达20英寸的零件
- 利用先进的CAM软件优化工具路径，降低成本
- 为数控加工零件提供整理选项
- 适用各种材料，包括铜、铝、钢、黄铜和塑料
- 为航空航天、汽车、国防、电子和医疗设备等行业提供服务
